testsuite.name: Scenario: Successfully create a new adaptive assignment with minimum data from dropdown button in the unit column

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create a new adaptive assignment with minimum data from dropdown button in the unit column

testcase.name: And I am on the Content Repository page of Demonstration Class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create a new adaptive assignment with minimum data from dropdown button in the unit column

testcase.name: When I choose creating new adaptive assignment from dropdown button in "Student Readiness" column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create a new adaptive assignment with minimum data from dropdown button in the unit column

testcase.name: Then Assignment Editor is opened
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create a new adaptive assignment with minimum data from dropdown button in the unit column

testcase.name: When I enter valid information for the assignment "Mathematics"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create a new adaptive assignment with minimum data from dropdown button in the unit column

testcase.name: And enter short name "math"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create a new adaptive assignment with minimum data from dropdown button in the unit column

testcase.name: And I save & close the assignment on the name page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create a new adaptive assignment with minimum data from dropdown button in the unit column

testcase.name: Then I see summary of the assignment with warning text "WARNING: No questions chosen for the assignment"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create a new adaptive assignment with minimum data from dropdown button in the unit column

testcase.name: When I save it anyway
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create a new adaptive assignment with minimum data from dropdown button in the unit column

testcase.name: Then the new assignment "Mathematics" is visible in its own expanded column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create a new adaptive assignment with minimum data from dropdown button in the unit column

testcase.name: And it is named as "Mathematics" in "Student Readiness" column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create a new adaptive assignment with minimum data from dropdown button in the unit column

testcase.name: classMethod
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create a new adaptive assignment with minimum data from dropdown button in the unit column

testsuite.system-out: # Adaptive Assignment info: http://localhost:8000/mapleta/help/MapleTAInstructor/ch03s04.html Scenario: Successfully create a new adaptive assignment with minimum data from the main dropdown button ?[90m# CreateAssignment.feature:50?[0m ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI choose creating new adaptive assignment in "?[0m?[32m?[1mStudent Readiness?[0m?[32m" unit from the main dropdown button?[0m ?[90m# ContentRepositorySteps.chooseCreatingNewAdaptiveAssignmentFromMainDropdownButton(String)?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mAssignment Editor is opened?[0m ?[90m# AssignmentEditorDetailsSteps.assertAssignmentEditorPageIsOpened()?[0m ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI enter valid information for the assignment "?[0m?[32m?[1mEngineering?[0m?[32m"?[0m ?[90m# AssignmentEditorDetailsSteps.enterAssignmentNameAndDescription(String)?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI save & close the assignment on the name page?[0m ?[90m# AssignmentEditorDetailsSteps.saveAndCloseAssignment()?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI see summary of the assignment with warning text "?[0m?[32m?[1mWARNING: No questions chosen for the assignment?[0m?[32m"?[0m ?[90m# AssignmentEditorDetailsSteps.assertNoQuestionsInAssignmentWarningMessageIsDisplayed(String)?[0m ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI save it anyway?[0m ?[90m# AssignmentEditorDetailsSteps.saveAssignmentAnyway()?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mthe new assignment "?[0m?[32m?[1mEngineering?[0m?[32m" is visible in its own expanded column?[0m ?[90m# ContentRepositorySteps.assertNamedAssignmentColumnIsExpanded(String)?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mit is named as "?[0m?[32m?[1mEngineering?[0m?[32m" in "?[0m?[32m?[1mStudent Readiness?[0m?[32m" column?[0m ?[90m# ContentRepositorySteps.assertAssignmentIsCreated(String,String)?[0m
